messages.subject: raffle last year at the SC conference
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/14/03 8:44:19 PM, genant2@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/14/03 8:44:19 PM, genant2@... writes:

<< Thanks Ren and speaking of the raffle...are you doing it this year? I
have
some great things to contribute. >>

Does anyone know (or remember, or happen to be) who got the baseball jigsaw
puzzle last year? Because there was a copy of a printout of the website
where it's ensconced forever (however long websites are going to last <bwg>),
and since I was at the hospital I didn't get to give the little speeches that
went with the raffle items. Sorry.

But for whoever got that puzzle, I had used it here:

sandradodd.com/truck

Sandra
